author: Teo Armus, Antonia Farzan
title: Live updates: China reports highest number of new coronavirus cases in nearly six weeks; U.S. weighs risks of May 1 restart - The Washington Post
description: Live updates: China reports highest number of new coronavirus cases in nearly six weeks; U.S. weighs risks of May 1 restart The Washington Post China's new coronavirus cases near 6-week high, Russian border new battleground Reuters China sees 108 new virus ca…
content:
China reported 108 new coronavirus cases in the past 24 hours, the highest daily total since March 5, the countrys National Health Commission said Monday.
While those numbers are still far short of the daily totals that were reported during the height of the… [+834 chars]
